Address.value: 50 HEALTH SCIENCES DRIVE, STONY BROOK, New York, 11790, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Applied DNA Sciences, Inc., a biotechnology company, develops and commercializes technologies to produce and detect deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) in the Americas, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Therapeutic DNA Production Services MDx Testing Services and DNA Tagging and Security Products and Services. The Therapeutic DNA Production Services segment develops and commercializes the LinearDNA platform, which enables a cellfree manufacture of highfidelity synthetic DNA sequences for use in nucleic acidbased therapeutics.
